activities: mBlox operates a transaction network providing operator connectivity and consumer engagement to businesses around the world, managing the delivery of mobile content and mobile services as the intermediary between businesses and mobile operators. mBlox receives personal information from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland in three ways: (i) from its customers in connection with providing services to those customers; (ii) through its website, sales channels and human resources functions, including from prospective customers and employee candidates; and (iii) from its employees.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: off-line, on-line, manually processed data, human resources data
recoursemech: For human resources data: EU data protection authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner; For all other types of data: BBB EU Safe Harbor
